instructions:
Combine each ingredient in the above order and mix well before adding the next ingredient. Finally add
the salad oil and whisk or shake well to homogenize.
This may be used as a table salad dressing or as a marinade for frozen salad vegetables, particularly for
frozen 3 or 4 bean with added chopped onions and peppers. This is the same recipe as used for "Marinated
Carrots". It may be refrigerated for 3 months.
name: French Salad Dressing Or Vegetable Marinade
